name: Select.Value

placeholder.description: A placeholder value to display when no value is selected.
placeholder.description_zh: A placeholder value to display when no value is selected.

asChild.description: Whether to use render delegation with this component or not.
asChild.description_zh: Whether to use render delegation with this component or not.

description: A representation of the select menu's value, which is typically displayed in the trigger.

slots.name: attrs
slots.description: Additional attributes to apply to the element if using the asChild prop with delegation.
slots.description_zh: Additional attributes to apply to the element if using the asChild prop with delegation.

slots.name: label
slots.description: The label of the currently selected item.
slots.description_zh: The label of the currently selected item.
